name: 華國媛
objective:
The course introduces nanomaterials and their preparation processes (including chemical method and physical methods). Future development and applications are also discussed. This course will cover the following topics:1. Introduction of nanomaterials and Nano-chemistry; 2. Nanomaterials: structure and analysis; 3. Quantum mechanics; 4. Nanomaterials: self-assembly; 5. Nanomaterials: simulation; 6. Carbon-based nanomaterials; 7. Advanced synthesis and processing 8. Growth and application of semiconductor nanoparticles; 9. SEG & ESG prospectives.
本門授課之目的在於介紹奈米材料及其製程 (包括化學法及物理法奈米材料法)，並探討奈米材料的未來發展及應用。所包括的課程主題如下：1. 奈米材料與奈米化學簡介。2. 奈米材料與結構分析 3. 量子力學；4. 奈米材料自我組成 5. 奈米材料模擬 6. 碳化奈米材料 7 先進奈米材料製成 8. 奈米材料的應用；9. 奈米材料的遠景與未來發展。
schedule:
Week        Title
1      Introduction on nanomaterials- nanotechnology in the ancient days and nature
2.    Nanomaterials: synthesis and structure
3.    Nanomaterials - nanocrystalline materials, nanocomposites, nanoporous material
4.   Nanomaterials- metal-organic frameworks (MOFs), inorganic-organic hybrid nanocomposites
5.    Quantum mechanics for beginners
6.    Electrical properties 
7.    Magnetic properties 
8.    Surface properties 
9.    Midterm Exam
10.  Mechanical properties 
11.  Optical properties 
12.  Core-shell nanoparticles and gold nano-shells
13.   Carbon nanoworld - fullerenes, carbon nanotubes and graphene 
14.   Synthesis of nanomaterials at atomic scale
15.   Applications of nanomaterials and nanotechnology
16.    SDG of nanotechnology
17.    Safety Issues, Regulations, and Public Perception
18.    Final exam
